problem:
问题4. 证明:设 $x, y, z, w \in \mathbf{R}^{+}, \alpha+\beta+\gamma+\theta=(2 k+1) \pi, k \in \mathbf{Z}$, 则
$$
|x \sin \alpha+y \sin \beta+z \sin \gamma+w \sin \theta| \leqslant \sqrt{\frac{(x y+z w)(x z+y w)(x w+y z)}{x y z w}} .
$$
solution: 记 $u=x \sin \alpha+y \sin \beta, v=z \sin \gamma+r \sin \theta$, 则 $u^2=(x \sin \alpha+y \sin \beta)^2 \leqslant (x \sin \alpha+y \sin \beta)^2+(x \cos \alpha-y \cos \beta)^2=x^2+y^2-2 x y \cos (\alpha+\beta)$. 同理可得 $v^2 \leqslant z^2+w^2-2 z w \cos (\theta+\gamma)$. 注意到已知条件 $\alpha+\beta+\gamma+\theta=(2 k+1) \pi (k \in \mathbf{Z})$, 有 $\cos (\alpha+\beta)+\cos (\gamma+\theta)=0$, 因此 $\frac{x^2+y^2-u^2}{2 x y}+\frac{z^2+w^2-\gamma^2}{2 z w} \geqslant 0$, 即 $\frac{u^2}{x y}+\frac{v^2}{z w} \leqslant \frac{x^2+y^2}{x y}+\frac{z^2+w^2}{z w}=\frac{(x z+y w)(x w+y z)}{x y z w}$. 另外, 应用 Cauchy 不等式有 $|u+v| \leqslant \sqrt{\left(\frac{u^2}{x y}+\frac{v^2}{z w}\right)(x y+z w)} \leqslant \sqrt{\frac{(x y+z w)(x z+y w)(x w+y z)}{x y z w}}$, 得证.
